TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);
type WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler = delegate of obj * WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于定义委托事件的类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以访问的事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期间引发事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 构造对象使用 IIS 和当前提供的 Windows 标识并将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 可以使用的属性对象提供给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件以便设置属性与当前到自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值属性期间**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，由 IIS 提供标识用作当前请求标识 Windows。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则的属性对象设置为返回的标识方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property of the object is set to the identity returned by the method. **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件才会引发时身份验证设置为和是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**设置事件属性的当前向自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
